content: A `CheckboxGroup` is used to group multiple `Checkbox` components. It allows users to select one or more items from a list of choices. The orientation can be set to `horizontal` or `vertical`.
A CheckboxGroup can be a controlled component. Use the `value` prop (an array of selected values) and the `onValueChange` event to manage its state.
The CheckboxGroup supports validation. You can use the `isInvalid` prop to mark the group as invalid and provide an `errorMessage` to guide the user.
The CheckboxGroup has several stylable slots: `base` (the root wrapper), `wrapper` (wraps the checkboxes), `label`, `description`, and `errorMessage`.
For advanced customization, you can use the `useCheckboxGroup` hook to build a completely custom implementation while retaining the core logic and accessibility features.
